Ipswich Mobile Library Route 3

Contact us:

Managers: Andrew Little and David Cook

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Route 3 Town/village Location Time
3A Rushmere St Andrew Blackdown Avenue 0935 – 1005
3B Martlesham Heath Douglas Bader 1015 – 1145
3C Hasketon Village Hall 1200 – 1215
3D Bredfield Glebe Road 1220 – 1235
3E Bredfield Village Hall 1240 – 1305
3G Clopton Rous Hall Estate 1320 – 1345
3H Grundisburgh Post Mill Gardens 1450 – 1510
3I Grundisburgh Dog Inn 1515 – 1600
3J Tuddenham St Martin Fountain 1615 – 1630

Calling every 4 weeks on Thursdays:

2019: 10 January, 7 February, 7 March, 4 April, 2 May, 30 May, 27 June, 25 July, 22 August, 19 September, 17 October, 14 November, 12 December

2020: 9 January
